p: The antimicrobial properties of the AgNPs were tested against 3 reference microbial and 1 fungal strains: Gram-positive Staphylococcus aureus ( S. aureus ATCC 6538) and Gram-negative Escherichia coli ( E. coli ATCC 8739), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ( P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027), and Candida albicans ( C. albicans 10231).
